rl.sqltrainer.domain

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • rl.sqltrainer.domain.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains all those properties of a database, which are needed by the SQLTrainer to access it properly.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.io.File description
      File containing a textual description of the database.
      private java.lang.String logicalName
      Logical name of the database.
      private java.lang.String physicalName
      Server-side physical name of the database.
      private java.io.File schema
      File containing a schema image of the database.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File getDescription()
      Returns a File for accessing a corresponding description text or null.
      java.lang.String getLogicalName()
      Returns the logical name of the database.
      java.lang.String getPhysicalName()
      Returns the physical (server-side) name of the database.
      java.io.File getSchema()
      Returns a File for accessing a corresponding schema image or null.

    • Field Detail

      • logicalName

        private java.lang.String logicalName
        Logical name of the database.

      • physicalName

        private java.lang.String physicalName
        Server-side physical name of the database. For administrative reasons, it sometimes might be convenient, to put more than one small training database into the same physical database.

      • schema

        private java.io.File schema
        File containing a schema image of the database.

      • description

        private java.io.File description
        File containing a textual description of the database.
